meanings.definition: A mark or symbol made by pressing a tool onto a surface.
meanings.sent1: The blacksmith's touchmark on the sword showed his craftsmanship.
meanings.sent2: The touchmark on the pottery indicated the artist who made it.
meanings.sent3: The touchmark on the cake was a surprise decoration.
meanings.sent4: Her laughter left a touchmark on his heart.
meanings.sent5: The touchmark on the tree bark was like a secret code.

meanings.definition: A distinctive mark or symbol used by a craftsman to identify their work.
meanings.sent1: The jeweler's touchmark on the ring proved its authenticity.
meanings.sent2: The touchmark on the furniture revealed the skilled carpenter.
meanings.sent3: The touchmark on the sandwich made it look fancy.
meanings.sent4: His kindness left a touchmark on everyone he met.
meanings.sent5: The touchmark on the map led them to hidden treasure.
